traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The scream thief can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Life Drain
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (4d8 damage) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Silence the Living {@recharge 5}
entries: The scream thief forces a humanoid within 30 feet of it to make a DC13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 19 (3d12 damage) psychic damage, is {@condition frightened}, and is unable to vocalize a sound of any kind. The target may repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns to end these effects. On a success the creature takes half as much damage and is not {@condition frightened} or silenced.
